00012 double BdkP2::s23() const {
00013   return BdkDP::sumMasses2() -_s12 -_s13;
00014 }
00015 
00016 void BdkP2::setS12S23(double s12, double s23) {
00017   _s12 = s12;
00018   _s13 = BdkDP::sumMasses2() - s12 - s23;
00019 }

00021 void BdkP2::setS13S23(double s13, double s23) {
00022   _s13 = s13;
00023   _s12 = BdkDP::sumMasses2() - s13 - s23;
00024 }

00041 void BdkP2::Draw(int fillColor, double radius, int fillStyle) const {
00042   TEllipse * el = new TEllipse(s12(), s13(), radius, radius);
00043   el->SetFillColor(fillColor);
00044   el->SetFillStyle(fillStyle);
00045 
00046   // Prevent the line from covering a small-radius fill:
00047   el->SetLineWidth(0);
00048   el->SetLineColor(fillColor);
00049 
00050   el->Draw();
00051 }

00054 bool BdkP2::operator==(const BdkP2&p) const {
00055   return (fabs(_s12 - p._s12) < BdkDP::tolerance() && 
00056           fabs(_s13 - p._s13) < BdkDP::tolerance());
00057 }
